rules.natural: Either a scientist discovered a material, or a researcher is recognized by the community.
Under the condition that a paper is influential, it follows that the paper was accepted by a journal.
Either a material was analyzed in a lab, or it is not the case that a scientist discovered a material.
Provided that results were published in a journal, it follows that a material was not analyzed in a lab.
Whenever results are peer reviewed, it follows that the results were published in a journal.
If results are groundbreaking, then a researcher is recognized by the community.
Either a paper was retracted, or it is not the case that a study has flawed methodology.
In the event that a paper was accepted by a journal, the paper was not retracted.
On the condition that a paper was cited by a researcher, the paper was accepted by a journal.
If it is not the case that either a paper was cited by a researcher or a paper is influential, then the paper is controversial.
Assuming that results are not groundbreaking, it follows that a study has flawed methodology.

facts.natural: It is not the case that a paper is controversial.

target.natural: A researcher is recognized by the community.

steps.natural: Results were published in a journal.
It is not the case that a material was analyzed in a lab.
It is not the case that a scientist discovered a material.
A researcher is recognized by the community.
One of the following holds: a paper was cited by a researcher, or a paper is influential.
A paper was accepted by a journal.
It is not the case that a paper was retracted.
It is not the case that a study has flawed methodology.
A researcher is recognized by the community.

natural_facts.A2: A material was analyzed in a lab.
natural_facts.A3: Results were published in a journal.
natural_facts.A8: A paper was accepted by a journal.
natural_facts.A9: A paper was cited by a researcher.
natural_facts.G: A researcher is recognized by the community.

natural_expressions: Either a scientist discovered a material, or a researcher is recognized by the community.
Under the condition that a paper is influential, it follows that the paper was accepted by a journal.
Either a material was analyzed in a lab, or it is not the case that a scientist discovered a material.
Provided that results were published in a journal, it follows that a material was not analyzed in a lab.
Whenever results are peer reviewed, it follows that the results were published in a journal.
If results are groundbreaking, then a researcher is recognized by the community.
Either a paper was retracted, or it is not the case that a study has flawed methodology.
In the event that a paper was accepted by a journal, the paper was not retracted.
On the condition that a paper was cited by a researcher, the paper was accepted by a journal.
One of the following holds: a paper was cited by a researcher, or a paper is influential.
If it is not the case that either a paper was cited by a researcher or a paper is influential, then the paper is controversial.
Assuming that results are not groundbreaking, it follows that a study has flawed methodology.
Results were published in a journal.
Results were peer reviewed.
Results are groundbreaking.
A paper was accepted by a journal.
A researcher is recognized by the community.
It is not the case that a scientist discovered a material.
It is not the case that a paper is controversial.
It is not the case that a material was analyzed in a lab.
It is not the case that a study has flawed methodology.
It is not the case that a paper was retracted.

(A1 ∨ G).natural: Either a scientist discovered a material, or a researcher is recognized by the community.

(A10 → A8).natural: Under the condition that a paper is influential, it follows that the paper was accepted by a journal.

(A2 ∨ ¬A1).natural: Either a material was analyzed in a lab, or it is not the case that a scientist discovered a material.

(A3 → ¬A2).natural: Provided that results were published in a journal, it follows that a material was not analyzed in a lab.

(A4 → A3).natural: Whenever results are peer reviewed, it follows that the results were published in a journal.

(A5 → G).natural: If results are groundbreaking, then a researcher is recognized by the community.

(A7 ∨ ¬A6).natural: Either a paper was retracted, or it is not the case that a study has flawed methodology.

(A8 → ¬A7).natural: In the event that a paper was accepted by a journal, the paper was not retracted.

(A9 → A8).natural: On the condition that a paper was cited by a researcher, the paper was accepted by a journal.

(A9 ∨ A10).natural: One of the following holds: a paper was cited by a researcher, or a paper is influential.

(¬(A9 ∨ A10) → A11).natural: If it is not the case that either a paper was cited by a researcher or a paper is influential, then the paper is controversial.

(¬A5 → A6).natural: Assuming that results are not groundbreaking, it follows that a study has flawed methodology.

A3.natural: Results were published in a journal.

A8.natural: A paper was accepted by a journal.

G.natural: A researcher is recognized by the community.

¬A1.natural: It is not the case that a scientist discovered a material.

¬A11.natural: It is not the case that a paper is controversial.

¬A2.natural: It is not the case that a material was analyzed in a lab.

¬A6.natural: It is not the case that a study has flawed methodology.

¬A7.natural: It is not the case that a paper was retracted.
